page.shortlink: api client api a5 d date calendar generate datetime method

argument.name: date
argument.description: The calendar date that was generated by the *[link:Date.toCalendar]* method. This may be a value like "next Tuesday" or "1st Jan 2018".

argument.name: time
argument.description: The time that was generated by the *[link:Date.toCalendar]* method. This may be a value like "2:00pm".

return.name: dateTime
return.description: The grammatically correct format of a calendar date-time. For example an input of "next Tuesday" and "2:00pm" would generate "next Tuesday at 2:00pm" by default, the "at" being inserted by this method.

page.description: The method used to combine a date and a time into a grammatically correct format.
